context: Major commercial bank, 100,000 employees, evaluating participation in central bank digital currency ecosystem

request.purpose: Develop CBDC integration capabilities and wallet infrastructure for retail customers
request.justification: Prepare for potential CBDC launch, maintain competitive position, reduce reliance on commercial stablecoins

decision_process.outcome: Identified high probability of CBDC implementation in next 3-5 years across major markets
Developed modular CBDC integration platform compatible with multiple national currencies
Projected $50 million annual revenue opportunity with 12% ROI on $150 million investment
Designed limited pilot program for 10,000 high-value customers with full compliance monitoring
Approved with conditions - quarterly compliance reviews and technology partner oversight

business_impact.projected_customer_adoption: 25% of retail customer base within 5 years
risk_factors: Competition from fintech and big tech players
strategic_benefits: New revenue streams from digital services
Improved customer experience with instant payments
